---
title: "Nos photos"
lightbox: true
output: html_document
---

```{r, include = FALSE}

gallery <- function(folder, count, link){
  for (i in 2:count) {
    cat('![](', folder, i, paste0('.jpg){group=', link,' style="display:none"}'), '\n', sep = "")
  }
}
```

```{r echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
gallery("photo/tri_sud_vendee_2024/", 2, "tri_sud_vendee_2024")
```
